kit.leader_skill: "Uncontrollable Power" Category Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +80%

super_attack.name: Meteor Crush
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

passive_skill.name: Broly's Genes
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +1; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Uncontrollable Power" Category characters: Damage reduction rate 20% up; For every turn passed: (Forever) Damage reduction rate 4% up (up to 20%); Starting from the 7th turn from the character's entry turn: (Forever) Damage reduction rate 4% down for every turn passed (no more than -20%)

lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki
When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Uncontrollable Power" Category characters

lines.text: Damage reduction rate 4% down for every turn passed (no more than -20%)
lines.context: Starting from the 7th turn from the character's entry turn
